name: Fallout 4: Game of The Year Pip-Boy Edition
summary: In addition to including the award-winning original game and official add-ons, Fallout 4 G.O.T.Y. Pip-Boy Edition includes: Pip-Boy Replica and Stand. This wearable device faithfully replicates the in-game model and comes complete with RobCo Industries stand, adjustable foam cuff, rotating knobs and lights. Designed to accommodate a variety of smartphone devices with customizable foam inserts, the Pip-Boy is the ultimate accessory for the official Pip-Boy companion mobile app that allows players to manage their in-game inventory, perks, holotapes, and more.
version_title: Game of The Year Pip-Boy Edition
